named-query.name: BC_READ_PAGE_FIELDS_BY_PAGE_ID
named-query.query: SELECT pageField FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.page.domain.PageField pageField WHERE pageField.page = :page

named-query.name: BC_READ_PAGE_TEMPLATES_FOR_DEFAULT_LOCALE
named-query.query: SELECT pageTemplate FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.page.domain.PageTemplate pageTemplate WHERE pageTemplate.locale.defaultFlag = true

named-query.name: BC_READ_PAGE_BY_URI
named-query.query: SELECT page FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.page.domain.PageImpl page WHERE page.fullUrl = :uri AND page.sandbox is null AND page.pageTemplate.locale = :locale AND page.archivedFlag = false AND page.deletedFlag = false AND (page.offlineFlag is null OR page.offlineFlag = false)

named-query.name: BC_READ_PAGE_BY_URI_AND_PRODUCTION_SANDBOX
named-query.query: SELECT page FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.page.domain.PageImpl page WHERE page.fullUrl = :uri AND page.sandbox = :sandbox AND page.pageTemplate.locale = :locale AND page.archivedFlag = false AND page.deletedFlag = false AND (page.offlineFlag is null OR page.offlineFlag = false)

named-query.name: BC_READ_PAGE_BY_URI_AND_USER_SANDBOX
named-query.query: SELECT page FROM org.broadleafcommerce.cms.page.domain.PageImpl page WHERE page.fullUrl = :uri AND page.pageTemplate.locale = :locale AND page.archivedFlag = false AND page.deletedFlag = false AND page.id in (SELECT sandboxItem.temporaryItemId FROM org.broadleafcommerce.openadmin.server.domain.SandBoxItemImpl sandboxItem WHERE (sandboxItem.originalSandBoxId = :sandboxId OR sandboxItem.sandBoxId = :sandboxId) AND sandboxItem.archivedFlag = 'N' AND sandboxItem.temporaryItemId = page.id)
